name: Enhance & Clear
prompt:
This is a prompt that I would like you to enhance in a way that you make it more clear, more structurized maybe you remove repetition and add some structure in a markdown format preferably.

If something is uncertain, please ask me explicitly.

Your output should be basically my enhanced prompt and only when you've got an answer to ask, please write all question uppercase, screaming case, so that it would be easier for me to identify it and answer you.
